name: SYZYGY (borb.)
description:
A short, minimalistic rhythm game based on aligning the stars.

This is a post-jam version of my A Game By Its Cover 2017 jam entry, based on this Famicase by @fannyluor.

The game begins with a calibration sequence.

If the planets feel out of sync, just restart the game and retry.

Interact with spacebar / left alt / tapping the touchscreen.

Quit with Esc, Full screen with F4.

One of itch.io's favorite jam games of 2017.
